options.subtitle: here, you can customize how the page looks for you
options.translation: if the language you speak is not here, you can head to the translation page and translate the page to your language
options.premadeTheme: pick one of the premade themes...
options.exportThemeMsg: theme code has been copied to clipboard
options.clearPreferencesPrompt: do you really want to clear your preferences? (this will remove your custom theme and language settings, but it will keep your login session)
options.clearPreferencesDone: the preferences have been cleared successfully
options.clearPreferencesNotDone: the preferences have been left unchanged

about.privacy: this website uses your local storage to store your preferences, and you are the only person who can access them apart from the script that loads your preferences. this website does NOT use tracking or marketing cookies. it only uses cookies to store your login session if you decide to log into my website, you can check how that works for yourself in the repository, but if you want to save yourself the hassle, just know that i don't care about tracking you or selling your soul to the devil through cookies and my website will never devolve into such a deranged mindset that most of the internet has for some reason.
about.collaboration: this website is fully open source and i intend to keep it that way. i appreciate collaborators so if you want to contribute you can make a new issue to report bugs or make a new pull request to add some of your own code into my website. you can do so in the github repository which is linked below.
about.specialThanks: venn, clembs, karl2883, dave, carrot farmer, earlofrats, angel753, ali kirb and you. i strongly appreciate your admiration and support towards this website whether it's regarding code, assets (venn :D) or simply moral support.
about.repository: you can find this website's source code here:
about.socialMedia: you can find me on the following social media:

q+a.title: questions and answers
q+a.jumpToPageTooHigh: the page you specified is too high, please specify a lower one
q+a.jumpToPageTooLow: the page you specified is too low, please specify a higher one (i.e. above zero)
q+a.invalidPage: you accessed an invalid page, i wonder how you did that. here's a silly face if you're bored
q+a.submitSendSuccess: your question has been sent successfully!
q+a.submitSendErrorQuestionMissing: your question is either empty or you just put spaces in it, try to formulate a coherent question
q+a.submitSendErrorOther: there was an internal error when trying to send the question. it is the following:
